name: Deadrinds
description:
Deadrinds is an old school JRPG with a dark fantasy setting. Two souls, that were chained together must escape the wrath of an ancient nightmare. Travel the lands to find a way to break the chain and during your travels meet some very weird characters.



  • Tactical one-on-one battles with party rotations
  • No random encounters, explore and solve puzzles at your own pace
  • Charming dialogue, have weird discussions with your party members
  • Explore strange relics of an age long forgotten, find hidden stages and the secrets they are hiding
  • A dark fantasy story, there are no heroes in this world
  • Upgrade your stats, unlock spells, collect powerful weapons artefacts
